actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Emmanuel A.H. Pangilinan, Ana Amalia L. Pangilinan, and John Alfred A.L. Pangilinan.

summary.text: Directs the Attorney General to: (1) suspend and withhold deportation of three named individuals for a five-year period on the condition that certain written assurances are made regarding the vocation of one of such individuals; and (2) adjust the status of such individuals to that of aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence upon compliance with such assurances.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Emmanuel A.H. Pangilinan, Ana Amalia L. Pangilinan, and John Alfred A.L. Pangilinan.
